official.headline: System Stability Restored
official.anchor_line: Recent disruptions in the Behavior Compliance Index were quickly addressed by government agencies.
official.contextual_reframing: Temporary adjustments demonstrate the strength and resilience of our automated governance, ensuring a seamless path forward.

underground.headline: BCI Chaos Exposed
underground.anchor_line: Malfunctions and hidden footage reveal cracks in Stenograd’s ‘perfect’ system.
underground.contextual_reframing: Despite state claims, insider leaks hint at sabotage and cover-ups fueling rising public unrest.
